summary: A diffusion pipeline that creates images from text prompts containing wildcard placeholders. It expands placeholders using supplied word lists or external files, then runs the Stable Diffusion model (VAE, CLIP text encoder, UNet, scheduler) to generate the images, optionally applying safety checks.
business_intent: Provide developers and content creators with a flexible tool to generate varied, highâ€‘quality images from template prompts, supporting rapid visual content production for marketing, media, gaming, and design workflows.
